name: ABOMINATION OBTAINER
description:
ABOMINATION OBTAINER NEW HIT GAME BY RIGBY "DANGER" DIRT - EATER...OBTAIN ABOMINATIONS CATCH THEM, VIEW THEM, APPRECIATE THEM. INSPIRED BY THECATAMITES' SPACE FUNERAL AND MURDER DOG

SHORT GAME ~5 MINUTES...PLAY. HAVE FUN.

CONTROLS:

-HOVER OVER THINGS FOR MORE INFORMATION ABOUT THEM

-CLICK ON ABOMINATIONS

-JUMP IN HOLE
